name: Emerald
description:
This is the test version of Emerald, it will end in the first chapter.

*BGM is not added
*DIARY function does not work
*Press ESC to skip the story
*The beta version is only up to the first chapter

The game consists of a prologue, 
five chapters (short stories) (each chapter have a mission for the main story) 
and a final chapter for the ending.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There is a cosy town called EMERALD.
According to legend, there is a goddess living in the forest of this small town. She guarding the ecological balance of this forest, guiding and blessing to the residents of this small town, helping people harvest, and teaching people herbal medicine knowledge. 

But as time goes by, the ancient myths are gradually forgotten. Today there are only a few residents who live nearby the forest are still believed in the forest sprite.
The development plan caused the forest sprite and shrine to face a crisis. 

The player will act as a supervisor to manage the preparation of the harvest festival in the town.
The mission is to prepare the harvest festival of the forest sprite in next 28 days, to promote the ancient culture and beauty of the forest area to the residents of the town, and strive to make the city and the forest coexist.
